I am a teacher and researcher, interested in Machine Learning and Data Mining, and especially in the application of these techniques to solve problems affecting the world. More specifically, I am interested in data-driven modeling and simulation of complex spatio-temporal processes. My background is in Computer Science and Engineering, and my PhD thesis was related to semantic Video Analytics, using Bayesian modeling techniques. I am currently an Assistant Professor in the Department of Artificial Intelligence, IIT Kharagpur. I am currently focusing on Climate Informatics  (application of Data Science/Machine Learning to solve problems in Climate Science), Deep Generative Models and Agent-based Models.Research Interests:   1) Climate Informatics                                              2)  Agent-based modeling of social processes (elections, urban mobility                                              3) Remote
